alert.note: Alert for Northern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 7:25PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New London County through 815 PM EDT... At 724 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hebron, or near Colchester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colchester, Lebanon, Sprague and Franklin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
